body: I don't break any rules on Avicus Network, is my favorite server .-. Only i'm an good PvP Player because @glitchy1 i'm don't an rule breaker can you unban me from avicus network?
body_tagged: I don't break any rules on Avicus Network, is my favorite server .-. Only i'm an good PvP Player because @glitchy1 i'm don't an rule breaker can you unban me from avicus network?
title: Appeal.

replies.body:
Please send an e-mail to support@avicus.net stating why you were banned and why you deserve to be unbanned.

Do not make topics like these on the forums.
replies.body_tagged:
Please send an e-mail to support@avicus.net stating why you were banned and why you deserve to be unbanned.

Do not make topics like these on the forums.

replies.body: Email support@avicus.net with a proper appeal.
replies.body_tagged: Email support@avicus.net with a proper appeal.

replies.body:
Send an email to support@avicus.net 
There you can explain the details of your appeal

EDIT: I got ninja'd
